title: Last Lullaby - Thomas's Song (Winter Serenade) The Piano Guys
description:
Over the years, my very good friend Carl Sandquist has come up with some wonderful melodies (e.g. Morning Light) which he has asked me to help develop into songs.  He came up with the primary melody to this tune a few years ago and we always hoped we’d find a chance to develop it further. That chance came at the passing of Carl and Emily’s precious two week-old baby, Thomas. We felt that this song was for him. The special privilege of being able to prepare and play this song for baby Thomas’ funeral is a tender experience I will never forget. This song is dedicated to those of you who have lost a little one.

Download the Album "Winter Serenade" https://thepianoguys.com/products/winter-serenade

👉 Subscribe to our channel https://bit.ly/2XH4GCF for more heartwarming melodies that capture the spirit of the season. 

WE’RE ON TOUR: https://smarturl.it/the10tour 
The Piano Guys Christmas Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n543eKIdbUI&list=PL606521018AE6D597
